Similar issues were supposed to be fixed in bug 632423, but this one is not (checked on 20110302 nightly on Windows XP), see the attached screenshot

STR:
Open the page http://cricket.yahoo.com/photos/india-vs-england-plays-of-the-day_12988336443396 and see the photo description on the right side




Reproducible: Sometimes
